attributes.action: review the rules for granting medical exemption certificates to include ANY person who needs medication for life (eg diabetics)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A medical excemption certificate entitles the holder to free prescriptions.

Many conditions require medication for life - yet patients have to pay, this is a high bill when some doctors will only issue repeat presriptions for 1 months supply of medication at a time.

The rules for what conditions qualify people for an excemption certificate are full of inconsistences and need to be generously brought into the 21st century.
